titles.title: Child and Dependent Care FSA Enhancement Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance.
Child and Dependent Care FSA Enhancement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Child and Dependent Care FSA Enhancement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $7,500 the amount of employer-provided dependent care assistance that an employee may exclude from gross income. Allows an annual inflation adjustment to such increased amount after 2010.
